column5: I've been looking for an Argo for a few weeks now and haven't come up with a good one yet, so I thought I'd put it out there to you guys if you see one for sale must be an 8 wheeler could you let me know. I would even consider new or a demo if it is a good deal. The list price on these things new is way out of line as far as I'm concerned but you never know there might be a deal lurking out there somewhere, thanks.
